lines.text:
[to Jenny]
You think I'm a killer, don't you?
Hmm, you mean as it stands, they don't know who you are?

They don't even know I'm in England, but when they do know, well, I'm trapped, I'm washed up, I'm locked up! That's why I've got less than 36 short hours to clear myself and find who killed Katie and a lot of other things!
I've got a club membership card. It's got both our signatures on it. You can copy from the original.
She wrote beautifully.
She did everything beautifully.
Well, what d'ya want?
Let's start off with a clean shirt. I realize it's highly improbable to expect you to have a clean shirt, but I need one.
Hey, you can't talk to me like that. You've got to get out of h...
[he glimpses Rogers' gun]
... here.
[pointing very nervously]
Um, there's a shirt there.

[laughs]
Why don't you cry? It's always easier to talk terms to a woman when she's crying.

[he looks at her lecherously]
I never could believe anybody could be so low!
Just a minute, let's get this straight. Who are you?
Henry Slosson.
And your uncle? What's he done so bad that Orville can shake him down?
He's a terrible man. My life has been corrupted and dirtied by him! He deals in every shady business in the gutter of mankind!

[to Slosson]
Henry's a weakling. You probably made him that way!
